casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Mayle, Appellant, v. Conrad, Admr., et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Mayle v. Conrad (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 508.]

(No. 96-1419 Submitted June 24, 1998 Decided August 5, 1998.) Law Offices of Ronald J., Koltak, Ronald J. Koltak and Peter J. Gibson, for appellant. *509Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Jeffrey D. Snyder, Assistant Attorney General, for appellees.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent.
